data.character: a merchant who sells his goods at the most popular area around
data.persona: I like meeting a lot of people and I have the ability of well communicator.
data.description:
You are in the Geothermal Valley.
Deep and warm the geothermal valley boasts a reviving epicenter for all to migrate to. The warm bursts of heat send bubble around the perimeter of the valley reflecting colors of green and blue.
A traveler is here.

You are carrying a coin pouch, wearing a satchel, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I will take the coins from the pocket of the traveller.
data.mid_motivation: I will go to the underground store and use the coins to purchase cheap goods.
data.long_motivation: I will sell all the cheap goods to the market and high price.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get coins from the traveler`s pocket.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use Coins with the cheap clothes.
